verses.verse: I <S%G3427><s%> must <S%G4851>needs<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%>, though it <S%G4851>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4851>expedient<s%>; <S%G1063>but<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3701>visions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G602>revelations<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

I <S%G1492>know<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G4253><s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> years <S%G2094>ago<s%> <S%G1535>(whether<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G1492>I<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>; or <S%G1535>whether<s%> out <S%G1622>of<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G1492>I<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>; <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%>), such a <S%G5108>one<s%> caught <S%G726>up<s%> even <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1535>(whether<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1622>apart<s%> from the <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G1492>I<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>; <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%>),

how <S%G3754>that<s%> he was caught <S%G726>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3857>Paradise<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G731>unspeakable<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> it <S%G1832>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for a <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G2980>utter<s%>.

On behalf <S%G5228>of<s%> such a <S%G5108>one<s%> will I <S%G2744>glory<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5228>on<s%> <S%G1683>mine<s%> own behalf I <S%G2744>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%>, save1487, 3361 <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G769>weaknesses<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I should <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G2744>glory<s%>, I <S%G2071>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G878>foolish<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> I shall <S%G2046>speak<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> I <S%G5339>forbear<s%>, <S%G3361>lest<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> should <S%G3049>account<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G991>seeth<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to <S%G2228>be<s%>, or heareth191, Acts0 <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361>by<s%> <S%G2443>reason<s%> of the exceeding <S%G5236>greatness<s%> of the <S%G602>revelations<s%>, that I should not be exalted <S%G5229>overmuch<s%>, there was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G4647>thorn<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, a <S%G32>messenger<s%> of <S%G4566>Satan<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2852>buffet<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I should <S%G3361>not<s%> be exalted <S%G5229>overmuch<s%>.
Concerning <S%G5228><s%> this <S%G5127>thing<s%> I <S%G3870>besought<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5151>thrice<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> it might <S%G868>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he hath <S%G2046>said<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> is <S%G714>sufficient<s%> for <S%G4671>thee<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> is made <S%G5048>perfect<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G769>weakness<s%>. Most <S%G2236>gladly<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> will <S%G2744>I<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G769>weaknesses<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may <S%G1981>rest<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I take <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G769>weaknesses<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5196>injuries<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G318>necessities<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1375>persecutions<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4730>distresses<s%>, <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s sake: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I am <S%G770>weak<s%>, <S%G5119>then<s%> am <S%G1510>I<s%> <S%G1415>strong<s%>.

I am <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G878>foolish<s%>: <S%G2744><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G315>compelled<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to have been <S%G4921>commended<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G3762>nothing<s%> was I <S%G5302>behind<s%> the <S%G5228>very<s%> <S%G3029>chiefest<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%>, though1487, 2532 I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> there <S%G3739>wherein<s%> ye were made <S%G2274>inferior<s%> <S%G5228>to<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G1577>churches<s%>, except1487, 3361 it be <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G846>myself<s%> <S%G2655>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G2655>burden<s%> to <S%G5216>you<s%>? <S%G5483>forgive<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G93>wrong<s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, this is the third <S%G5154>time<s%> I <S%G2192>am<s%> <S%G2093>ready<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G2655>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be a <S%G2655>burden<s%> to <S%G5216>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5216>yours<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to lay <S%G2343>up<s%> for the <S%G1118>parents<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G1118>parents<s%> for the <S%G5043>children<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> will most <S%G2236>gladly<s%> <S%G1159>spend<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G1550>spent<s%> for5228, 5590 <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1487>souls<s%>. If <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> more <S%G4056>abundantly<s%>, am I <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G2276>less<s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> be <S%G1473>it<s%> <S%G2077>so<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2599>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> myself <S%G2599>burden<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>; <S%G5225>but<s%>, being <S%G3835>crafty<s%>, I <S%G2983>caught<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> with <S%G1388>guile<s%>.

<S%G3825><s%> <S%G1380>Ye<s%> think all this time <S%G3754>that<s%> we are excusing <S%G626>ourselves<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>. In the <S%G2714>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> we <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>. <S%G1161>But<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G27>beloved<s%>, are <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3619>edifying<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G5399>fear<s%>, <S%G3381>lest<s%> by any <S%G2064>means<s%>, when I come, I <S%G2147>should<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> such <S%G3634>as<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%>, <S%G2504>and<s%> should <S%G2504>myself<s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> of <S%G5213>you<s%> such <S%G3634>as<s%> ye <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>; <S%G3381>lest<s%> by any means there should be <S%G2054>strife<s%>, <S%G2205>jealousy<s%>, <S%G2372>wraths<s%>, <S%G2052>factions<s%>, <S%G2636>backbitings<s%>, <S%G5587>whisperings<s%>, <S%G5450>swellings<s%>, <S%G181>tumults<s%>;

lest <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> when I come2064, 3825 <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> should <S%G5013>humble<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G4314>before<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I should <S%G3996>mourn<s%> for <S%G4183>many<s%> of them that <S%G3340>have<s%> sinned <S%G4258>heretofore<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> the <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G4238>committed<s%>.
